WRITING.TEXT: I haven't been up to Northern Cal in a while, but I do remember it being really different.
It can be pretty sunny, but on the days it isn't, either the humidity will leave you feeling gross or the air will be at optimum level for living
Oh man, that would suck for me, the one with the constant sneezing. California, on the other hand, is just hot all the time, with summer being like the only actual season over here
